text: Hianagi kagrira matipina aseogante'za, kasagafe atresagenka zafa zankuna'a kitagi atrazaza hunka, bainati kazinteti zamahe fri'nesnaza vahe'ene karanka mase'nesnanke'za zamagiareti krehapati'za vano hugahaze. Hagi hakare'a vahe'ma hapinti zamahe frizage'za, rehagagi'za kerifima asenezmantazafi asegante'nagenka amefenkame uramigahane.
